title: Touched By An Angel A 9/11 Short Story
description: This award winning short story is about love lost, friendship found. After losing his boyfriend in the World Trade Center on 9/11, Geoffrey Brooks meets and befriends Emily. Emily has also lost. She has lost her hero father, one of the 343 firefighters who lost their lives on that horrible day. This is the story of how two people found each other and taught each other how to trust and love again.
author: Kevin A. Carey-Infante
